name: CreateVendor
description:
Create and approve a new vendor automatically.

This tool is used to create a new vendor via the API. Vendors created are approved by default and bypass existing approval policies. Use this when you need to quickly add a vendor to the system.

parameters.name: vendor_creation_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing detailed information for creating the vendor. Includes fields for accounting ID, address, contacts, country, vendor name, payment and tax details requests, state (for US-based vendors), vendor owner ID, and tracking category. Ensure either `accounting_vendor_remote_id` or `vendor_tracking_category_option_id` is provided, not both.

accounting_vendor_remote_id.description: The accounting remote id of the vendor. At most one of `accounting_vendor_remote_id` or `vendor_tracking_category_option_id` should be provided.

business_vendor_contacts.description: Detailed information about the vendor contact.

name.description: Name of the new vendor to be created.

request_payment_details.description: Whether to request payment details from the vendor (ACH bank account, international wire transfer, and check mailing address). Requires a contact email.

request_tax_details.description: Whether to request tax information from the vendor (Tax Identification Number, federal tax classification, and tax address). Requires a contact email.

state.description: The state if country is US. Note that this field is ignored for non-US countries.

vendor_owner_id.description: Unique identifier of the user that will own this vendor.

vendor_tracking_category_option_id.description: Ramp unique identifier of the accounting vendor to link to this vendor. At most one of `accounting_vendor_remote_id` or `vendor_tracking_category_option_id` should be provided.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

accounting_vendor_remote_id.description: The accounting remote id of the vendor. At most one of `accounting_vendor_remote_id` or `vendor_tracking_category_option_id` should be provided.

business_vendor_contacts.description: Detailed information about the vendor contact.

name.description: Name of the new vendor to be created.

request_payment_details.description: Whether to request payment details from the vendor (ACH bank account, international wire transfer, and check mailing address). Requires a contact email.

request_tax_details.description: Whether to request tax information from the vendor (Tax Identification Number, federal tax classification, and tax address). Requires a contact email.

state.description: The state if country is US. Note that this field is ignored for non-US countries.

vendor_owner_id.description: Unique identifier of the user that will own this vendor.

vendor_tracking_category_option_id.description: Ramp unique identifier of the accounting vendor to link to this vendor. At most one of `accounting_vendor_remote_id` or `vendor_tracking_category_option_id` should be provided.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
